Name: Hentai Killer
About the game: Hentai Killer - a third-person shooter in which an anime girl fights against an anime zombie for saving own life. Destroy anime zombies and do not let them close to you. Try to stay alive and clear the area. Features Different anime zombies with abilities Multiplayer Leaderboard Steam achievements Advanced AI 4 different weapons 1 Beautiful map Mode without HUD (Press Q Button in game) Credits: Programming: PlatSTUDIO Music and effects: zapsplat
